character.name: Rosseta
character.desc: Books older sister, uses mana to power spells

Mana.name: Mana
Mana.desc: Base limit of 3. When reaching the limit, spend the required <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> to gain 1 <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c> and 1 <c=status>LESSON</c>. Excess <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> is not lost.

ManaSpill.name: Mana Spill
ManaSpill.desc:
Reduce <c=status>Mana</c> by {0} at the start of your turn. 
Gain 1 on <c=downside>overheat</c>.

ManaMax.name: Mana Max
ManaMax.desc: Base limit of 3. When reaching the limit, spend the required <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> to gain 1 <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c> and 1 <c=status>LESSON</c>. Excess <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> is not lost.

DrawFireSpell.name: Draw Fire Spell
DrawFireSpell.desc: draw a <c=card>Fire Spell</c> from the spellbook to your hand

DrawAirSpell.name: Draw Air Spell
DrawAirSpell.desc: draw a <c=card>Air Spell</c> from the spellbook to your hand

DrawIceSpell.name: Draw Ice Spell
DrawIceSpell.desc: draw a <c=card>Ice Spell</c> from the spellbook to your hand

ManaFlask.name: Mana Flask
ManaFlask.desc: Put a <c=card>Mana Bottle</c> in your hand

DrawAcidSpell.name: Draw Acid Spell
DrawAcidSpell.desc: draw a <c=card>Acid Spell</c> from the spellbook to your hand

GlassPack.name: Glass Pack
GlassPack.desc: Put a <c=card>Mana Bottle</c> and a <c=card>Crystal Shard</c> in your hand, gain 1 <c=status>heat</c>

SpellSheet.name: Spell Sheet
SpellSheet.desc: Learn 1 new <c=card>spell</c> and add it to your hand

DrawSpecialSpell.name: Draw Special Spell
DrawSpecialSpell.desc: draw a <c=card>Special Spell</c> from the spellbook to your hand

SpellDrawTest.name: Spell Draw Test
SpellDrawTest.desc: draw a card from the spellbook to your hand

SpellDebugCard.name: Spell Debug Card
SpellDebugCard.desc: A spell for testing purposes, has no actions
